verses.verse: Thus all the work <S%H4399><s%> that SHlomo <S%H8010><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> for the house <S%H1004><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> was finished <S%H7999><s%> <S%H8799><s%>: and SHlomo <S%H8010><s%> brought <S%H935><s%> <S%H8686><s%> in all the things <S%H6944><s%> that David <S%H1732><s%> his father <S%H1><s%> had dedicated <S%H6944><s%>; and the silver <S%H3701><s%>, and the gold <S%H2091><s%>, and all the instruments <S%H3627><s%>, put <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> he among the treasures <S%H214><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>.

Then SHlomo <S%H8010><s%> assembled <S%H6950><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, and all the heads <S%H7218><s%> of the tribes <S%H4294><s%>, the chief <S%H5387><s%> of the fathers <S%H1><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, unto Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%>, to bring up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8687><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> out of the city <S%H5892><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%>, which is TZiyon <S%H6726><s%>.

Wherefore all the men <S%H376><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> assembled <S%H6950><s%> <S%H8735><s%> themselves unto the king <S%H4428><s%> in the feast <S%H2282><s%> which was in the seventh <S%H7637><s%> month <S%H2320><s%>.
And all the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%>; and the L'vi'im <S%H3881><s%> took up <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%>.

And they brought up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%>, and the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>, and all the holy <S%H6944><s%> vessels <S%H3627><s%> that were in the tabernacle <S%H168><s%>, these did the Kohanim <S%H3548><s%> and the L'vi'im <S%H3881><s%> bring up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8689><s%>.

Also king <S%H4428><s%> SHlomo <S%H8010><s%>, and all the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> that were assembled <S%H3259><s%> <S%H8737><s%> unto him before <S%H6440><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%>, sacrificed <S%H2076><s%> <S%H8764><s%> sheep <S%H6629><s%> and oxen <S%H1241><s%>, which could not be told <S%H5608><s%> <S%H8735><s%> nor numbered <S%H4487><s%> <S%H8735><s%> for multitude <S%H7230><s%>.

And the Kohanim <S%H3548><s%> brought in <S%H935><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> unto his place <S%H4725><s%>, to the oracle <S%H1687><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%>, into the most <S%H6944><s%> holy <S%H6944><s%> place, even under the wings <S%H3671><s%> of the cherubims <S%H3742><s%>:

For the cherubims <S%H3742><s%> spread forth <S%H6566><s%> <S%H8802><s%> their wings <S%H3671><s%> over the place <S%H4725><s%> of the ark <S%H727><s%>, and the cherubims <S%H3742><s%> covered <S%H3680><s%> <S%H8762><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> and the staves <S%H905><s%> thereof above <S%H4605><s%>.

And they drew out <S%H748><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the staves <S%H905><s%> of the ark, that the ends <S%H7218><s%> of the staves <S%H905><s%> were seen <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8735><s%> from the ark <S%H727><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the oracle <S%H1687><s%>; but they were not seen <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8735><s%> without <S%H2351><s%>. And there it is unto this day <S%H3117><s%>.

There was nothing in the ark <S%H727><s%> save the two <S%H8147><s%> tables <S%H3871><s%> which Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> put <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> therein at Horev <S%H2722><s%>, when the YY <S%H3068><s%> made <S%H3772><s%> <S%H8804><s%> a covenant with the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, when they came out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8800><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>.

And it came to pass, when the Kohanim <S%H3548><s%> were come out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8800><s%> of the holy <S%H6944><s%> place: (for all the Kohanim <S%H3548><s%> that were present <S%H4672><s%> <S%H8737><s%> were sanctified <S%H6942><s%> <S%H8694><s%>, and did not then wait <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8800><s%> by course <S%H4256><s%>:

Also the L'vi'im <S%H3881><s%> which were the singers <S%H7891><s%> <S%H8789><s%>, all of them of Asaph <S%H623><s%>, of Heman <S%H1968><s%>, of Jeduthun <S%H3038><s%>, with their sons <S%H1121><s%> and their brethren <S%H251><s%>, being arrayed <S%H3847><s%> <S%H8794><s%> in white linen <S%H948><s%>, having cymbals <S%H4700><s%> and psalteries <S%H5035><s%> and harps <S%H3658><s%>, stood <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8802><s%> at the east end <S%H4217><s%> of the altar <S%H4196><s%>, and with them an hundred <S%H3967><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> Kohanim <S%H3548><s%> sounding <S%H2690><s%> <S%H8688><s%> with shofars <S%H2689><s%>:)

It came even to pass, as the trumKefas <S%H2690><s%> <S%H8764><s%> <S%H8675><s%> <S%H2690><s%> <S%H8764><s%> and singers <S%H7891><s%> <S%H8789><s%> were as one <S%H259><s%>, to make one <S%H259><s%> sound <S%H6963><s%> to be heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8687><s%> in praising <S%H1984><s%> <S%H8763><s%> and thanking <S%H3034><s%> <S%H8687><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>; and when they lifted up <S%H7311><s%> <S%H8687><s%> their voice <S%H6963><s%> with the shofars <S%H2689><s%> and cymbals <S%H4700><s%> and instruments <S%H3627><s%> of musick <S%H7892><s%>, and praised <S%H1984><s%> <S%H8763><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>, saying, For he is good <S%H2896><s%>; for his mercy <S%H2617><s%> endureth for ever <S%H5769><s%>: that then the house <S%H1004><s%> was filled <S%H4390><s%> <S%H8804><s%> with a cloud <S%H6051><s%>, even the house <S%H1004><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>;

So that the Kohanim <S%H3548><s%> could <S%H3201><s%> <S%H8804><s%> not stand <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8800><s%> to minister <S%H8334><s%> <S%H8763><s%> by reason <S%H6440><s%> of the cloud <S%H6051><s%>: for the glory <S%H3519><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> had filled <S%H4390><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>.
